resources.string: Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'.
Location permission is required for this demo.
Please enter your business / item, etc.
Please fill in your mobile phone number
Are you sure you want to close this page?
You have not installed Google Maps or the map version is too low
Consecutive check in to win integral

1. Log-in users can sign in once a day and receive rewards.

2. There will be extra points for 7 consecutive check-in days, and no extra points for the remaining consecutive check-in days.

3. When the continuous check-in is interrupted, the accumulated points will be retained, and will not be cleared, but the consecutive check-in days will be accumulated again.

4. If there is a user violation, where has the right to terminate its sign-in immediately.
The login representative agrees to the \n "User Agreement" and "Privacy Policy"

Please fill in the detailed delivery address
Please fill in the name of the consignee
Please fill in the receiving phone number
Dear users, thank you for trusting and using Where, we have formulated

Please read carefully and fully understand the relevant terms before you click Agree. Clicking the agree button means that you have agreed to the foregoing agreement and the following agreement.

 1. When only browsing, we will apply for system permission to collect device information and log information for information push in order to guarantee service needs. And apply for storage permissions for caching related files during the browsing process and maintaining in-app version upgrades.

 2. In order to recommend content and display information to you based on your location, we may apply for location permissions from you.

 3. In order to help you call complaints or other consultation hotlines in the APP, we may apply for the call permission. This permission does not collect private information and is only used when you use the aforementioned functions.
4. In order to realize the third-party login and information sharing functions, we are using the third-party MobTech [ShareSdk] product. For the privacy policy terms of this product, please refer to:
5. In order to better help you solve the problems that may occur during use, we use a third-party Comm100 [Comm100 Live Chat] product. For the privacy policy of this product, please refer to:
6. In order to realize the push function, we have introduced the [JPush] product of the third-party Jiguang SDK. For the privacy policy of this product, please refer to:

7. The above permissions and sensitive permissions such as cameras, GPS, cameras, albums, microphones, storage space, etc. will not be enabled by default or forcibly to collect information. Only express authorization will be used for the realization of functions or services. You can refuse and Does not affect your continued use of Where.
You need to agree to the "Guidelines for the Protection of Personal Information" before we can continue to provide services to you

Where is a city wide life app developed by Cloudtech, integrating local information, including government, businesses, schools and various institutions, so as to make the information accurate and public, and to make the local life service online in Bataan, so as to make the people and tourists more convenient
G/F GICC TECHNOPARK, PHASE 3, LUZON AVENUE, FREEPORT AREA BATAAN MARIVELES, BATAAN

1. Please copy the where receiving account and transfer to the payment platform.\n2. Enter the correct payment amount. After the payment is successful, return to this page; click I have paid and fill in the transfer information.
